title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication Implementation
summary: Develop a robust login system with multi-factor authentication.
description: This epic covers the creation of a secure authentication mechanism utilizing multi-factor authentication (MFA) for customer login. It includes integration with identity verification services, secure password management, and adaptive authentication techniques. The goal is to safeguard user identities and ensure compliance with financial security standards, providing a secure entry point for all portal interactions.

title: Personalized Dashboard Development
summary: Design and implement a personalized, data-driven dashboard.
description: This epic focuses on building a customized dashboard that dynamically adapts to the user’s profile, preferences, and eligibility for various banking products. The dashboard should present relevant account details, product offers, and quick access to commonly used services. The design must prioritize simplicity, responsiveness, and accessibility to deliver a consistent experience across all devices.

title: Responsive User Interface Framework
summary: Create a unified, responsive interface for seamless experience across devices.
description: This epic entails the implementation of a front-end framework ensuring a consistent and responsive user interface across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. It will cover adaptive design principles, accessibility compliance, optimization for performance, and user experience testing to ensure fluid navigation and functionality regardless of platform or screen size.

title: Self-Service Account and Service Request Workflows
summary: Enable customers to submit account openings and service modifications with minimal effort.
description: This epic enables customers to perform essential banking tasks such as account opening and service modification through intuitive, guided workflows. It will include digital forms, process automation, document uploads, and the ability to save incomplete applications for later completion. The workflows must minimize manual steps and provide progress indicators for improved user experience.

title: Real-Time Notifications and Request Tracking
summary: Provide real-time status updates and automated email notifications.
description: This epic aims to keep customers informed about the status of their submitted requests through real-time tracking dashboards and automated email alerts. Integration with the notification engine will ensure that updates are promptly triggered upon workflow state changes, providing transparency and timely communication throughout the request lifecycle.

title: User Interaction History and Activity Records
summary: Maintain a complete interaction log for transparency and compliance.
description: This epic focuses on capturing and storing detailed records of user actions, including requests, document uploads, and approvals. It will ensure data integrity and provide users access to their historical activities in a readable format. The design will adhere to privacy and regulatory requirements, implementing secure storage and encryption for sensitive data.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate portal functions with the core banking infrastructure.
description: This epic ensures seamless data exchange between the self-service portal and the bank’s core systems using secured APIs or middleware. It will handle synchronization of customer data, accounts, and transactional information, ensuring real-time accuracy while maintaining a decoupled architecture for optimized performance and reliability.

title: Role-Based Access Control and Security Governance
summary: Implement role-based access management and data protection frameworks.
description: This epic delivers a structured access control system that governs which users can access specific content or perform particular actions based on their roles and permissions. It emphasizes least-privilege principles, includes audit trails for security reviews, and ensures compliance with internal and regulatory data protection standards to protect sensitive customer information.
